Ah, wait, I see that it has something to do with my use of Eclipse.  My wor=
kflow was to run the modified heritrix3 code from eclipse after setting the=
 Run Configurations (with appropriate VM and standard arguments), modifying=
 logging.properties, and switching the logToFile value to true within the c=
rawer-beans.cxml.

I wasn't carefully examining the output on Eclipse, expe=
cting there to be an actual log file.  Hmm, I'll need to figure out how to =
get this log that is printing to standard out to the expected log file (the=
 logging.properties file notes it as "heritrix_out.log".

Where is this log=
 file that was mentioned that would contain the beans id of the DecideRule?=
  What folder is it located under?

I'd like to find that log file if it ex=
ists, as it seems to contain only the output specific to the rules.
